problems.title: Product Under Modulo
problems.description:
You are given three integers a, b, and m. Your task is to compute (a * b) % m.

Input Format:
Three space-separated integers a, b, and m.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, (a * b) % m.
hintsList: Compute (a % m * b % m) % m to avoid overflow when a and b are large.
